body: Well this is the first ntr manga I've read that's not even ntr
Here we go. Minor changes of the same book being uploaded. How many we gonna pump.
how many of these are you gonna reupload?
If you ignore the plot there’s no evidence of NTR

I agree waste of art with this. Also there was literally no point in adding the childhood friend. Just make a story about a slut or a girl turning into a slut its not that hard. Like do you really need the 10% of the story just to have a cuck/secondary character to be involved? This type of "ntr" (whether you want to call this ntr or not) is what makes ntr so oversaturated and feel unneeded
all his posts are the same shit, such a waste of good art
I don't get ut as well. This shit ass why reupload.  Terasu sucks unless he does longer series
